docs.snippet: A body found preserved by the snow in upstate New York in 1970 held many clues, but none have so far yielded answers about who the man was or who killed him....
docs.lead_paragraph: A body found preserved by the snow in upstate New York in 1970 held many clues, but none have so far yielded answers about who the man was or who killed him.
docs.abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes puzzling details in case surrounding body of man found in snow in Saugerties, NY, in 1970; notes man, who had been shot four times in head, remains unidentified after decades of investigation.

headline.main: A Case So Cold the Dead Man Wore Pajamas Under His Suit
headline.print_headline: In Upstate New York, a Case So Cold the Dead Man Wore Pajamas Under His Suit

docs.snippet: Reaction to the death of Nobel Peace Prize laureate and Holocaust survivor Elie Wiesel, 87, author of "Night." His death was announced Saturday by Israel's Yad Vashem Holocaust Memorial....

docs.snippet: Activist and writer Elie Wiesel, the World War Two death camp survivor who won a Nobel Peace Prize for becoming the life-long voice of millions of Holocaust victims, died on Saturday. He was 87....
docs.lead_paragraph: Activist and writer Elie Wiesel, the World War Two death camp survivor who won a Nobel Peace Prize for becoming the life-long voice of millions of Holocaust victims, died on Saturday. He was 87.

headline.main: Holocaust Survivor, Nobel Laureate Elie Wiesel Dies at 87
